invalid-minimum.errmsg: invalid schema: minimum is of type string, should be one of [integer, number]

invalid-exclusiveminimum.errmsg: invalid schema: exclusiveMinimum is of type string, should be one of [boolean]

exclusive-minimum.errmsg: instance is not strictly greater than the required minimum

maximum-only.errmsg: instance is greater than the required maximum

inclusive-maximum.errmsg: instance is greater than the required maximum

exclusive-maximum.errmsg: instance is not strictly lower than the required maximum
